song.eTitle: O for a Heart to Praise My God!

verses.verse: O for a heart to praise my God! A heart from sin set free, A heart that always feels Thy blood, So freely shed for me.
A heart resigned, submissive, meek, My dear Redeemer's throne, Where only Christ is heard to speak, Where Jesus reigns alone.
A heart in every thought renewed, And full of love divine, Perfect, and right, and pure, and good, A copy, Lord, of Thine.
